testsuite.name: NFS v3 TCP - Special Test 9

failure.message:
sh ./runtests -s -t /mnt/192.168.122.101/laptop.test
SPECIAL TESTS: directory /mnt/192.168.122.101/laptop.test cd /mnt/192.168.122.101/laptop.test; rm -f runtests runtests.wrk READWIN.txt Makefile op_unlk op_ren op_chmod dupreq excltest negseek rename holey truncate nfsidem nstat stat stat2 touchn fstat rewind telldir bigfile bigfile2 freesp cp runtests runtests.wrk READWIN.txt Makefile op_unlk op_ren op_chmod dupreq excltest negseek rename holey truncate nfsidem nstat stat stat2 touchn fstat rewind telldir bigfile bigfile2 freesp /mnt/192.168.122.101/laptop.test
check for proper open/unlink operation nfsjunk files before unlink: ls: cannot access .nfs*: No such file or directory ./nfs9IAf85 open; unlink ret = 0 nfsjunk files after unlink: -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 0 2010-11-18 12:11 .nfs0000000000021b2b00000007 data compare ok nfsjunk files after close: ls: cannot access .nfs*: No such file or directory test completed successfully.
check for proper open/rename operation nfsjunk files before rename: ls: cannot access .nfs*: No such file or directory ./nfsbAw1yEO open; rename ret = 0 nfsjunk files after rename: -rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 0 2010-11-18 12:11 .nfs0000000000021b2d00000008 data compare ok nfsjunk files after close: ls: cannot access .nfs*: No such file or directory test completed successfully.
check for proper open/chmod 0 operation testfile before chmod: -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 0 2010-11-18 12:11 ./nfsCFNYqh ./nfsCFNYqh open; chmod ret = 0 testfile after chmod: ---------- 1 root root 0 2010-11-18 12:11 ./nfsCFNYqh data compare ok testfile after write/read: ---------- 1 root root 100 2010-11-18 12:11 ./nfsCFNYqh test completed successfully.
check for lost reply on non-idempotent requests 100 tries
test exclusive create.
test negative seek, you should get: read: Invalid argument or lseek: Invalid argument lseek: Invalid argument
test rename
test truncate truncate succeeded
test holey file support Holey file test ok
second check for lost reply on non-idempotent requests testing 50 idempotencies in directory "testdir"
test rewind support
test telldir cookies entry for 0 (cookie 63): expected to find 139 entries, only found 0 error: Value too large for defined data type special tests failed Tests failed, leaving /mnt/192.168.122.101 mounted
